
// ================================================================
// TSU.UNIT,TSU-AUTO.UNIT,TSU-EXT.UNIT SCHEMA CONSTRUCTION GUIDE
// Auto-generated documentation from schema definitions
// ================================================================

Artifact table-of-contents navigation guide
O Quick navigation to all components in the schema.

D
D - [Domain](#domain-component) -

Artifact element-types-reference quick reference
O Complete reference for all element type keywords and their behaviors.

Section type_summary 2 Element Type Summary
D
D | Type | Scope | Resolution | Navigation |
D |------|-------|------------|------------|
D | `key` | Local | Immediate | Field access only |
D | `word` | Local | Immediate | Field access only |
D | `text` | Local | Immediate | Field access only |
D | `number` | Local | Immediate | Field access only |
D | `ref` | Global | Pass 1 | `Its field actor` |
D | `link` | Sibling | Pass 1 | `Its field actor` |
D | `ref_copy` | Previous | Pass 2+ | `Its field actor` |
D | `ref_child` | Parent→Child | Pass 2+ | `Its field actor` |
D | `up_copy` | Ancestor | Pass 2+ | `Its field actor` |
D | `type_of` | Child by type | Pass 2+ | `Its field actor` |
D | `tree` | Local | Immediate | `Its field.up/down/left/right actor` |
D
Section type_resolution_passes 2 Multi-Pass Resolution Details
D
D **Pass 1: Direct References**
D - `ref`: Global lookup by key in Find index
D - `link`: Parent-scoped lookup by key in FindIn index
D
D **Pass 2+: Derived References**
D - `ref_copy`: Copy pointer from previous resolved field
D - `ref_child`: Look up child in previously resolved parent
D - `up_copy`: Walk parent chain to ancestor type
D - `type_of`: Match child by component type name
D
D The loader continues passes until all references resolve or error count stabilizes.

Artifact domain-component structure overview

O Comp Domain parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Domain component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | name | key | . | + | Domain name |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D | version | word | . | + | Schema version |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${name}
D ${desc}
D ${version}
D ${Project_domain.project}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Project_domain actor  [Reverse link to Project](#project-component)
D ```

Artifact hardware-component structure overview

O Comp Hardware parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Hardware component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | hardware | key | . | + | Identifier (e.g., tsu_extropic_1) |
D | backend | word | . | + | tsu, tsu_emulated |
D | emulation | word | . | * | true/false for software emulation |
D | constraints | text | . | * | Hardware limits |
D | energy_model | text | . | * | Thermodynamic cost model |
D | latency_model | text | . | * | Latency model |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${hardware}
D ${backend}
D ${emulation}
D ${constraints}
D ${energy_model}
D ${latency_model}
D ${desc}
D ${Kernel_hardware.kernel}
D ${Tsukernel_hardware.tsu_kernel}
D ${Optimization_target.target}
D ${Fusion_hardware.fusion}
D ${Model_hardware.model}
D ${Tsucompilation_hardware.plan_id}
D ${Config_target.config}
D ${Targetconfig_hardware.target_id}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Tsu actor  [Link to Tsu](#tsu-component)
D Its Noisemodel actor  [Link to Noisemodel](#noisemodel-component)
D Its Kernel_hardware actor  [Reverse link to Kernel](#kernel-component)
D Its Tsukernel_hardware actor  [Reverse link to Tsukernel](#tsukernel-component)
D Its Optimization_target actor  [Reverse link to Optimization](#optimization-component)
D Its Fusion_hardware actor  [Reverse link to Fusion](#fusion-component)
D Its Model_hardware actor  [Reverse link to Model](#model-component)
D Its Tsucompilation_hardware actor  [Reverse link to Tsucompilation](#tsucompilation-component)
D Its Config_target actor  [Reverse link to Config](#config-component)
D Its Targetconfig_hardware actor  [Reverse link to Targetconfig](#targetconfig-component)
D ```

Artifact tsu-component structure detail

O Comp Tsu parent Hardware FindIn

O Defines a Tsu component with FindIn searchability under parent Hardware, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | tsu_id | key | . | + | TSU identifier |
D | process_node | word | . | + | Semiconductor node (e.g., 3nm) |
D | operating_T | word | . | + | Operating temperature (Kelvin) |
D | sample_rate | word | . | + | Max samples/sec |
D | entropy_budget | text | . | * | Max entropy generation rate |
D | precision | word | . | + | Effective bit precision |
D | connectivity | word | . | + | Interface: PCIe, CXL, optical |
D | programmable_energy | word | . | + | true/false |
D | physical_implementation | word | . | + | CMOS-stochastic, spintronics |
D | thermal_noise | word | . | * | Noise characteristics |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${tsu_id}
D ${process_node}
D ${operating_T}
D ${sample_rate}
D ${entropy_budget}
D ${precision}
D ${connectivity}
D ${programmable_energy}
D ${physical_implementation}
D ${thermal_noise}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.hardware}
D ${Tsukernel_tsu_target.tsu_kernel}
D ${Tsucompilation_target.plan_id}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Hardware](#hardware-component)
D Its Multileveltsu actor  [Link to Multileveltsu](#multileveltsu-component)
D Its Tsukernel_tsu_target actor  [Reverse link to Tsukernel](#tsukernel-component)
D Its Tsucompilation_target actor  [Reverse link to Tsucompilation](#tsucompilation-component)
D ```

Artifact kernel-component structure overview

O Comp Kernel parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Kernel component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | kernel | key | . | + | Unique kernel name |
D | hardware | ref | Hardware | + | Target hardware |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D | signature | text | . | + | Function signature |
D | body | text | . | + | Implementation template |
D | stochastic | word | . | * | true/false |
D | thermodynamic | word | . | * | true if governed by thermodynamics |
D | energy_fn | text | . | * | Energy function E(x;θ) |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${kernel}
D ${hardware}
D ${desc}
D ${signature}
D ${body}
D ${stochastic}
D ${thermodynamic}
D ${energy_fn}
D ${hardware.hardware}
D ${Tsukernel_copy_kernel.tsu_kernel}
D ${Fusion_fused_kernel.fusion}
D ${Op_kernel.op}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Tsukernel actor  [Link to Tsukernel](#tsukernel-component)
D Its Kernelparam actor  [Link to Kernelparam](#kernelparam-component)
D Its Kernelop actor  [Link to Kernelop](#kernelop-component)
D Its Clusterkernel actor  [Link to Clusterkernel](#clusterkernel-component)
D Its Variationalkernel actor  [Link to Variationalkernel](#variationalkernel-component)
D Its hardware actor  [Link to Hardware](#hardware-component)
D Its Tsukernel_copy_kernel actor  [Reverse link to Tsukernel](#tsukernel-component)
D Its Fusion_fused_kernel actor  [Reverse link to Fusion](#fusion-component)
D Its Op_kernel actor  [Reverse link to Op](#op-component)
D ```

Artifact tsukernel-component structure detail

O Comp Tsukernel parent Kernel FindIn

O Defines a Tsukernel component with FindIn searchability under parent Kernel, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | tsu_kernel | key | . | + | Tsu kernel name |
D | copy_kernel | up_copy | Kernel | + | Unique kernel name |
D | hardware | ref_copy | Hardware | + | Target hardware |
D | tsu_target | ref_child | TSU | + | Target TSU device |
D | energy_fn | text | . | + | Mathematical form: E(x) = ... |
D | sample_shape | word | . | + | Output shape |
D | thermal_relax | text | . | * | Relaxation time τ |
D | control_voltage | word | . | + | Programming voltage |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${tsu_kernel}
D ${copy_kernel}
D ${hardware}
D ${tsu_target}
D ${energy_fn}
D ${sample_shape}
D ${thermal_relax}
D ${control_voltage}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.kernel}
D ${copy_kernel.kernel}
D ${hardware.hardware}
D ${tsu_target.tsu_id}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Kernel](#kernel-component)
D Its Pottskernel actor  [Link to Pottskernel](#pottskernel-component)
D Its copy_kernel actor  [Link to Kernel](#kernel-component)
D Its hardware actor  [Link to Hardware](#hardware-component)
D Its tsu_target actor  [Link to Tsu](#tsu-component)
D ```

Artifact kernelparam-component structure detail

O Comp Kernelparam parent Kernel FindIn

O Defines a Kernelparam component with FindIn searchability under parent Kernel, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | param | key | . | + | Parameter name (M, N, K, stride, etc) |
D | type | word | . | + | C data type (float*, int, etc) |
D | calculation | text | . | + | How to calculate from tensor shapes |
D | dynamic | word | . | * | true/false for runtime calculation |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${param}
D ${type}
D ${calculation}
D ${dynamic}
D ${parent.kernel}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Kernel](#kernel-component)
D ```

Artifact kernelop-component structure detail

O Comp Kernelop parent Kernel FindIn

O Defines a Kernelop component with FindIn searchability under parent Kernel, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | op | key | . | + | Operation primitive name |
D | desc | text | . | * | Operation description |
D | input_rank | word | . | * | Expected input rank |
D | output_rank | word | . | * | Expected output rank |
D | dimension_calc | text | . | + | Code to calculate dimensions |
D | block_size | word | . | + | Threads per block |
D | grid_calc | text | . | + | Grid size calculation formula |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${op}
D ${desc}
D ${input_rank}
D ${output_rank}
D ${dimension_calc}
D ${block_size}
D ${grid_calc}
D ${parent.kernel}
D ${Op_kernel_op.op}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Kernel](#kernel-component)
D Its Op_kernel_op actor  [Reverse link to Op](#op-component)
D ```

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | target | ref | Hardware | + | Target device |

D | params | text | . | * | Optimization parameters |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |

D | fusion | key | . | + | Fusion pattern name |
D | pattern | text | . | + | Operations to fuse |
D | fused_kernel | ref | Kernel | * | Fused kernel |
D | hardware | ref | Hardware | * | Target hardware |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

D ```
D ${fusion}
D ${pattern}
D ${fused_kernel}

D ${desc}
D ${fused_kernel.kernel}
D ${hardware.hardware}
D ${Hybridsampling_fusion_pattern.layer}
D ```

D ```

O Defines a top-level Framework component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | framework | key | . | + | Framework name (thrml, jax) |
D | language | word | . | + | jax, python |
D | paradigm | word | . | + | probabilistic, energy_based |
D | runtime | word | . | + | gpu, tpu, tsu_emulated |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Artifact thrml-component structure detail

O Comp Thrml parent Framework FindIn

O Defines a Thrml component with FindIn searchability under parent Framework, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | thrml_id | key | . | + | Identifier |
D | version | word | . | + | Version string |
D | features | text | . | * | Features list |
D | hardware_accel | word | . | + | gpu, tpu, tsu_proto |
D | tsu_emulation | text | . | * | ideal, noisy, limited_entropy |
D | jit_compile | word | . | + | true/false for XLA |
D | control_flow | word | . | + | scan, while_loop |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${thrml_id}
D ${version}
D ${features}
D ${hardware_accel}
D ${tsu_emulation}
D ${jit_compile}
D ${control_flow}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.framework}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Framework](#framework-component)
D ```

Artifact pgmschema-component structure overview

O Comp Pgmschema parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Pgmschema component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | schema | key | . | + | PGM name |
D | variables | text | . | + | Variable list |
D | domains | text | . | + | Variable domains |
D | factors | text | . | + | Factor types |
D | graph_sparsity | text | . | + | dense, sparse, tree |
D | factor_graph | word | . | + | true/false |
D | energy_based | word | . | + | true/false |
D | tsu_suitable | word | . | + | true/false |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${schema}
D ${variables}
D ${domains}
D ${factors}
D ${graph_sparsity}
D ${factor_graph}
D ${energy_based}
D ${tsu_suitable}
D ${desc}
D ${Model_pgm_schema.model}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Loopypgm actor  [Link to Loopypgm](#loopypgm-component)
D Its Model_pgm_schema actor  [Reverse link to Model](#model-component)
D ```

Artifact model-component structure overview

O Comp Model parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Model component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | model | key | . | + | Model name |
D | type | word | . | + | probabilistic, pgm, energy_based, tsu_native |
D | hardware | ref | Hardware | * | Target hardware |
D | framework | ref | Framework | * | Framework |
D | pgm_schema | ref | PGMSchema | * | PGM structure |
D | tsu_use | word | . | * | preferred, required, avoided |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${model}
D ${type}
D ${hardware}
D ${framework}
D ${pgm_schema}
D ${tsu_use}
D ${desc}
D ${hardware.hardware}
D ${framework.framework}
D ${pgm_schema.schema}
D ${Tsucompilation_source.plan_id}
D ${Validation_target.rule}
D ${Project_model.project}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Multistatemodel actor  [Link to Multistatemodel](#multistatemodel-component)
D Its Variationalmodel actor  [Link to Variationalmodel](#variationalmodel-component)
D Its hardware actor  [Link to Hardware](#hardware-component)
D Its framework actor  [Link to Framework](#framework-component)
D Its pgm_schema actor  [Link to Pgmschema](#pgmschema-component)
D Its Tsucompilation_source actor  [Reverse link to Tsucompilation](#tsucompilation-component)
D Its Validation_target actor  [Reverse link to Validation](#validation-component)
D Its Project_model actor  [Reverse link to Project](#project-component)
D ```

Artifact tensor-component structure overview

O Comp Tensor parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Tensor component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | tensor | key | . | + | Tensor identifier |
D | shape | word | . | + | Shape |
D | dtype | word | . | + | Data type |
D | layout | word | . | + | Memory layout |
D | role | word | . | * | latent, observed, factor_param |
D | pgm_node | word | . | * | true if part of PGM |
D | distribution | ref | DistributionRule | * | Distribution |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${tensor}
D ${shape}
D ${dtype}
D ${layout}
D ${role}
D ${pgm_node}
D ${distribution}
D ${desc}
D ${distribution.distribution}
D ${Arg_tensor.arg}
D ${Energyfunction_params.energy_fn}
D ${Energyfactor_variables.factor}
D ${Energyfactor_param_tensor.factor}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its distribution actor  [Link to Distributionrule](#distributionrule-component)
D Its Arg_tensor actor  [Reverse link to Arg](#arg-component)
D Its Energyfunction_params actor  [Reverse link to Energyfunction](#energyfunction-component)
D Its Energyfactor_variables actor  [Reverse link to Energyfactor](#energyfactor-component)
D Its Energyfactor_param_tensor actor  [Reverse link to Energyfactor](#energyfactor-component)
D ```

Artifact op-component structure detail

O Comp Op parent Layer FindIn

O Defines a Op component with FindIn searchability under parent Layer, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | op | key | . | + | Operation name |
D | op_type | type_of | Op | * | Type of Op (e.g., "SamplingOp") |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D | stochastic | word | . | * | true/false |
D | kernel | ref | Kernel | * | Kernel reference |
D | kernel_op | ref_child | KernelOp | * | KernelOp from domain knowledge |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${op}
D ${op_type}
D ${desc}
D ${stochastic}
D ${kernel}
D ${kernel_op}
D ${parent.layer}
D ${kernel.kernel}
D ${kernel_op.op}
D ${Schedule_op.seq}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Layer](#layer-component)
D Its Arg actor  [Link to Arg](#arg-component)
D Its Samplingop actor  [Link to Samplingop](#samplingop-component)
D Its Variationalop actor  [Link to Variationalop](#variationalop-component)
D Its Beliefpropagationop actor  [Link to Beliefpropagationop](#beliefpropagationop-component)
D Its kernel actor  [Link to Kernel](#kernel-component)
D Its kernel_op actor  [Link to Kernelop](#kernelop-component)
D Its Schedule_op actor  [Reverse link to Schedule](#schedule-component)
D ```

Artifact arg-component structure detail

O Comp Arg parent Op FindIn

O Defines a Arg component with FindIn searchability under parent Op, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | arg | key | . | + | Argument name |
D | role | word | . | + | input, output, param |
D | tensor | ref | Tensor | + | Tensor reference in Model |
D | dtype | word | . | * | Data type override |
D | pgm_role | word | . | * | variable, factor_param, conditioning |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${arg}
D ${role}
D ${tensor}
D ${dtype}
D ${pgm_role}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.op}
D ${tensor.tensor}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Op](#op-component)
D Its tensor actor  [Link to Tensor](#tensor-component)
D ```

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |

D | target_id | key | . | + | Target identifier (e.g., tsu_prod, gpu_sim) |
D | hardware | ref | Hardware | + | Hardware to target |
D | mode | word | . | + | production, simulation, emulation, validation |
D | config | ref | Config | * | Model config to use |
D | codegen | word | . | + | true/false - generate code for this target |
D | priority | word | . | + | primary, fallback, validation |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |

D ${config}
D ${codegen}

Artifact searchparameter-component structure detail

O Comp Searchparameter parent SearchSpace FindIn

O Defines a Searchparameter component with FindIn searchability under parent Searchspace, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | param | key | . | + | Parameter name |
D | param_type | word | . | + | continuous, discrete, categorical, schedule |
D | range_min | word | . | * | Min value (for continuous/discrete) |
D | range_max | word | . | * | Max value |
D | values | text | . | * | List for categorical: "sequential,parallel,async" |
D | initial_value | word | . | * | Starting value |
D | mutation_rate | word | . | + | Probability of mutation (0.0-1.0) |
D | importance | word | . | * | high, medium, low (affects search priority) |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${param}
D ${param_type}
D ${range_min}
D ${range_max}
D ${values}
D ${initial_value}
D ${mutation_rate}
D ${importance}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.search_space}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Searchspace](#searchspace-component)
D Its Scheduleparameter actor  [Link to Scheduleparameter](#scheduleparameter-component)
D ```

Artifact scheduleparameter-component structure detail

O Comp Scheduleparameter parent SearchParameter FindIn

O Defines a Scheduleparameter component with FindIn searchability under parent Searchparameter, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | schedule_type | word | . | + | geometric, linear, exponential, adaptive |
D | T_initial | word | . | + | Starting temperature |
D | T_final | word | . | + | Ending temperature |
D | num_steps | word | . | + | Number of annealing steps |
D | cooling_rate | word | . | * | For geometric: T[i+1] = rate * T[i] |
D | adaptation | word | . | * | adaptive_variance, adaptive_acceptance |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${schedule_type}
D ${T_initial}
D ${T_final}
D ${num_steps}
D ${cooling_rate}
D ${adaptation}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.param}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Searchparameter](#searchparameter-component)
D ```

Artifact evolutionstrategy-component structure overview

O Comp Evolutionstrategy parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Evolutionstrategy component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | strategy | key | . | + | Strategy identifier |
D | algorithm | word | . | + | genetic_algorithm, CMA-ES, bayesian_opt, differential_evolution |
D | search_space | ref | SearchSpace | + | Search space to explore |
D | population | word | . | + | Population size |
D | generations | word | . | + | Number of generations |
D | elite_count | word | . | * | Number of elite individuals preserved |
D | crossover_rate | word | . | * | Crossover probability |
D | mutation_rate | word | . | * | Global mutation rate |
D | selection | word | . | + | tournament, roulette, rank, elitist |
D | parallel | word | . | + | true/false for parallel evaluation |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${strategy}
D ${algorithm}
D ${search_space}
D ${population}
D ${generations}
D ${elite_count}
D ${crossover_rate}
D ${mutation_rate}
D ${selection}
D ${parallel}
D ${desc}
D ${search_space.search_space}
D ${Experimenttrial_strategy.trial_id}
D ${Optimizationrun_strategy.run_id}
D ${Autotuneconfig_strategy.autotune}
D ${Variationalmodel_optimizer_ref.variational_free_energy}
D ${Autotuneextension_evolution_strategy.autotune}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Fitnessfunction actor  [Link to Fitnessfunction](#fitnessfunction-component)
D Its Multiobjective actor  [Link to Multiobjective](#multiobjective-component)
D Its search_space actor  [Link to Searchspace](#searchspace-component)
D Its Experimenttrial_strategy actor  [Reverse link to Experimenttrial](#experimenttrial-component)
D Its Optimizationrun_strategy actor  [Reverse link to Optimizationrun](#optimizationrun-component)
D Its Autotuneconfig_strategy actor  [Reverse link to Autotuneconfig](#autotuneconfig-component)
D Its Variationalmodel_optimizer_ref actor  [Reverse link to Variationalmodel](#variationalmodel-component)
D Its Autotuneextension_evolution_strategy actor  [Reverse link to Autotuneextension](#autotuneextension-component)
D ```

Artifact fitnessfunction-component structure detail

O Comp Fitnessfunction parent EvolutionStrategy FindIn

O Defines a Fitnessfunction component with FindIn searchability under parent Evolutionstrategy, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | fitness_fn | key | . | + | Fitness function name |
D | expression | text | . | + | Mathematical expression or composite |
D | components | text | . | + | "solution_quality:0.7, time_cost:0.2, energy:0.1" |
D | normalization | word | . | * | z_score, min_max, none |
D | higher_better | word | . | + | true/false |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${fitness_fn}
D ${expression}
D ${components}
D ${normalization}
D ${higher_better}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.strategy}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Evolutionstrategy](#evolutionstrategy-component)
D ```

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |

D | param | key | . | + | Parameter identifier |
D | adaptation | word | . | + | feedback_based, schedule_based, rl_based |
D | update_rule | text | . | + | Update formula or policy |
D | update_freq | word | . | + | Steps between updates |
D | bounds | text | . | * | Min/max bounds during adaptation |
D | initial_value | word | . | + | Starting value |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

D ${param}
D ${adaptation}

O Comp Performancemetric parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Performancemetric component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | metric | key | . | + | Metric identifier |
D | type | word | . | + | solution_quality, runtime, energy, convergence |
D | measurement | text | . | + | How to measure (formula or procedure) |
D | target_value | word | . | * | Target to achieve (stopping criterion) |
D | tolerance | word | . | * | Acceptable deviation |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${metric}
D ${type}
D ${measurement}
D ${target_value}
D ${tolerance}
D ${desc}
D ${Trialmetrics_metric.metric}
D ```

D ```

Artifact experimenttrial-component structure overview

O Comp Experimenttrial parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Experimenttrial component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | trial_id | key | . | + | Unique trial identifier |
D | strategy | ref | EvolutionStrategy | + | Strategy used |
D | generation | word | . | + | Generation number |
D | individual_id | word | . | + | Individual in population |
D | config_params | text | . | + | JSON of all parameter values |
D | fitness_score | word | . | * | Achieved fitness |
D | timestamp | word | . | * | Trial timestamp |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${trial_id}
D ${strategy}
D ${generation}
D ${individual_id}
D ${config_params}
D ${fitness_score}
D ${timestamp}
D ${desc}
D ${strategy.strategy}
D ${Optimizationrun_best_trial.run_id}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Trialmetrics actor  [Link to Trialmetrics](#trialmetrics-component)
D Its strategy actor  [Link to Evolutionstrategy](#evolutionstrategy-component)
D Its Optimizationrun_best_trial actor  [Reverse link to Optimizationrun](#optimizationrun-component)
D ```

Artifact trialmetrics-component structure detail

O Comp Trialmetrics parent ExperimentTrial FindIn

O Defines a Trialmetrics component with FindIn searchability under parent Experimenttrial, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | metric | ref | PerformanceMetric | + | Metric reference |
D | value | word | . | + | Measured value |
D | rank | word | . | * | Rank in population (1=best) |
D | improved | word | . | * | true/false vs previous best |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${metric}
D ${value}
D ${rank}
D ${improved}
D ${parent.trial_id}
D ${metric.metric}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Experimenttrial](#experimenttrial-component)
D Its metric actor  [Link to Performancemetric](#performancemetric-component)
D ```

Artifact optimizationrun-component structure overview

O Comp Optimizationrun parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Optimizationrun component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | run_id | key | . | + | Run identifier |
D | strategy | ref | EvolutionStrategy | + | Strategy used |
D | start_time | word | . | + | Start timestamp |
D | end_time | word | . | * | End timestamp |
D | total_trials | word | . | * | Total evaluations |
D | best_trial | ref | ExperimentTrial | * | Best trial found |
D | convergence | word | . | * | converged, max_gen, timeout |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${run_id}
D ${strategy}
D ${start_time}
D ${end_time}
D ${total_trials}
D ${best_trial}
D ${convergence}
D ${desc}
D ${strategy.strategy}
D ${best_trial.trial_id}
D ${Hyperparameterrule_learned_from.rule_id}
D ${Autotuneconfig_opt_from.autotune}
D ${Optimizationpattern_discovered_by.pattern_id}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Checkpoint actor  [Link to Checkpoint](#checkpoint-component)
D Its Paretofront actor  [Link to Paretofront](#paretofront-component)
D Its Resourcebudget actor  [Link to Resourcebudget](#resourcebudget-component)
D Its strategy actor  [Link to Evolutionstrategy](#evolutionstrategy-component)
D Its best_trial actor  [Link to Experimenttrial](#experimenttrial-component)
D Its Hyperparameterrule_learned_from actor  [Reverse link to Hyperparameterrule](#hyperparameterrule-component)
D Its Autotuneconfig_opt_from actor  [Reverse link to Autotuneconfig](#autotuneconfig-component)
D Its Optimizationpattern_discovered_by actor  [Reverse link to Optimizationpattern](#optimizationpattern-component)
D ```

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | checkpoint_id | key | . | + | Checkpoint identifier |
D | generation | word | . | + | Generation number |
D | population | text | . | + | Serialized population state |
D | best_fitness | word | . | + | Best fitness so far |
D | checkpoint_path | text | . | + | File path for checkpoint |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${checkpoint_id}
D ${generation}
D ${population}
D ${best_fitness}
D ${checkpoint_path}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.run_id}
D ${Autotuneconfig_resume_from.autotune}
D ```

D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Optimizationrun](#optimizationrun-component)

D | source_runs | text | . | + | Comma-separated run_ids to learn from |
D | model | text | . | * | Learned model (e.g., GP surrogate) |
D | improvement | word | . | * | Speedup vs random search |

Artifact autotuneconfig-component structure detail

O Comp Autotuneconfig parent Config FindIn

O Defines a Autotuneconfig component with FindIn searchability under parent Config, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | autotune | key | . | + | AutoTune identifier |
D | enabled | word | . | + | true/false |
D | strategy | ref | EvolutionStrategy | + | Optimization strategy |
D | budget | word | . | + | Max trials or time |
D | early_stop | word | . | * | Stop if no improvement for N trials |
D | opt_from | ref | OptimizationRun | * | Run that discovered this |
D | resume_from | ref_child | Checkpoint | * | Resume from checkpoint |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${autotune}
D ${enabled}
D ${strategy}
D ${budget}
D ${early_stop}
D ${opt_from}
D ${resume_from}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.config}
D ${strategy.strategy}
D ${opt_from.run_id}
D ${resume_from.checkpoint_id}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Config](#config-component)
D Its Autotuneextension actor  [Link to Autotuneextension](#autotuneextension-component)
D Its strategy actor  [Link to Evolutionstrategy](#evolutionstrategy-component)
D Its opt_from actor  [Link to Optimizationrun](#optimizationrun-component)
D Its resume_from actor  [Link to Checkpoint](#checkpoint-component)
D ```

D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |

D | pattern_id | key | . | + | Pattern identifier |
D | problem_class | word | . | + | maxcut, ising, protein_folding |
D | pattern_type | word | . | + | schedule, topology, fusion |
D | precondition | text | . | + | When pattern applies |
D | recommendation | text | . | + | What to do |
D | success_rate | word | . | * | Historical success rate (0.0-1.0) |
D | discovered_by | ref | OptimizationRun | * | Run that found it |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

D | variational | word | . | * | true/false for hybrid VI+MCMC |

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | loops_detected | word | . | * | true/false (tree vs. loopy) |
D | belief_prop | word | . | + | loopy_bp, mean_field |
D | max_iterations | word | . | * | BP convergence limit |
D | damping_factor | word | . | * | 0.5-1.0 for stability |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${loops_detected}
D ${belief_prop}
D ${max_iterations}
D ${damping_factor}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.schema}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Pgmschema](#pgmschema-component)
D ```

Artifact reference-resolution-guide workflow overview
O Multi-pass reference resolution algorithm that handles complex reference chains.

Section resolution_order 2 Resolution Order
D References resolve in passes until stable:
D
D **Pass 1: Direct References**
D - `ref`: Direct lookup in global index
D - `link`: Lookup in parent's child index
D
D **Pass 2+: Derived References**
D - `ref_copy`: Copies resolved reference from previous field
D - `ref_child`: Looks up child in previously referenced component
D - `up_copy`: Walks parent chain to find ancestor
D
D The loader repeats passes until error count stops changing (typically 2-4 passes).

Section chaining_pattern 2 Common Chaining Pattern
D ```
D Element base_ref    ref       Target    +
D Element child_ref   ref_child ChildType +
D ```
D First field resolves Target by name, second field looks up ChildType within that Target.

Section up_chain_pattern 2 Up-Chain Pattern
D ```
D Element context     up_copy   Ancestor  +
D Element target      ref_child ChildType +
D ```
D First field walks parents to find Ancestor, second field looks up ChildType within it.

Section common_patterns 2 Common Design Patterns
D
D **Pattern 1: Direct Reference**
D ```
D Element target ref ComponentType +
D ```
D Simple global lookup.
D
D **Pattern 2: Reference Chain**
D ```
D Element parent_ref   ref       Parent +
D Element child_ref    ref_child Child  +
D ```
D Two-level lookup: resolve parent, then find child within parent.
D
D **Pattern 3: Ancestor Lookup**
D ```
D Element ancestor  up_copy   Ancestor +
D Element target    ref_child Target   +
D ```
D Navigate up hierarchy to find ancestor, then look up child within it.
D
D **Pattern 4: Reference Reuse**
D ```
D Element original  ref      Target +
D Element copy      ref_copy Target +
D ```
D Resolve once, copy pointer multiple times for efficiency.
D
D **Pattern 5: Sibling Link**
D ```
D Element sibling link SiblingType +
D ```
D Reference sibling component under same parent.
D
